mapper.select: select id, school_id schoolId, school_name schoolName, region_id regionId, camera_id cameraId, vid_src_name vidSrcName, cam_rtsp_inner_net_ip camRtspInnerNetIp, cam_rtsp_outer_net_ip camRtspOuterNetIp, vid_inner_net_rtsp_url vidInnerNetRtspUrl, vid_outer_net_rtsp_url vidOuterNetRtspUrl, cam_rtmp_inner_net_ip camRtmpInnerNetIp, cam_rtmp_outer_net_ip camRtmpOuterNetIp, vid_inner_net_rtmp_url vidInnerNetRtmpUrl, vid_outer_net_rtmp_url vidOuterNetRtmpUrl, stat from t_edu_bd_bri_kit_stove where stat = 1
